name: WuXu's Library++
subtitle: The Most Up-To-Date IPA Library on AltStore.
description:
Welcome to WuXu’s Library++!

This source contains all your favourite tweaked apps, free streaming, cracked apps, and more!

This highly organised AltSource is made up of many different tweaked apps that I, myself, inject each and every deb/dylib (tweak) into. While making sure everything is working perfectly and to my standards.

This source is updated 2-3 times a week, or more depending on the urgency. But I am working on automating updates through a python bot which I am close to completing.

If you enjoy my source please spread the word, this is essentially an updated QuarkSources, and I would like it to be as big, if not, bigger!

To make requests, get support or chat with other users, join the discord server! https://discord.gg/nKXsSdbEDc

WuXu’s Sources Official Website: https://wuxu1.github.io/

apps.name: Snapchat iota
apps.subtitle: The best paid tweak for Snapchat!
apps.localizedDescription:
THIS TWEAK IS PAID (NOT FREE). Please join Kanji's official Discord to pay for the tweak and to see the most up-to-date feature list. This will support the dev in his work by providing us with frequent and useful updates.

Note: Notifications may not work.

iota supports: iPhone 6s and above | iOS 13.0 and above

After joining the Discord, you can purchase iota for a one-time fee of $11.99 from https://discord.com/channels/1081620692316999740/shop

 
Features

CHAT:

“Chat Ghost”: Read chats without marking them as read.
“Hide Bitmoji”: Hide your bitmoji when in chat.
“Screenshot/Record Suppression”: Suppress screenshot/screen record notifications.
“No Typing Notifications”: When typing a message, this won’t notify the recipient.
“Auto Save Chats”: Automatically save all chats.
“Auto Save Delay”: Delay between each auto-save in seconds.
“Upload Audio Note”: Tap voice recording button to upload audio notes.
“Auto Save Audio Note”: Automatically save audio notes after playing them to completion.
“Keep Snaps”: Snaps sent or received will be shown in chat, only for you.
“Confirm Calls”: Show a confirmation dialog before making calls.
“Hide Call Buttons”: Hide the call buttons in chat.
“Streak Expiry Timer”: Show streak timer for current streaks.
“Ignore Deleted Chats”: Stop chats from being deleted.
“Deleted Chat Color”: Color for deleted chats.
 

UPLOAD - SAVE - SEEN:

“Upload Button”: Show an overlay button to upload media from camera roll.
“Long Uploads”: Upload videos longer than 10 seconds as one Snap.
“Save Media”: Choose whether you’d like to save snaps/stories to camera roll or to a local folder.
“Save Folder”: Open the local folder where you save snaps/stories
“Saved Audio Notes Folder”: Open the local folder where you saved audio notes too.
“Skip on Seen”: Skip to the next snap when marked as seen.
“Stories Auto-Seen”: Automatically mark all non-friend stories as seen.
“Snap Ghost”: Use a button to manually mark snaps as seen.
“Story Ghost”: Use a button to manually mark stories as seen.
 

ADDITIONS:

“Experiment Stuff”: Enable Snapchat experiments.
“Enable Snapchat+”: Spoof Snapchat+ Subscription.
“Disable Ads”: Block all Snapchat advertisements.
“Branding”: Show iota name and version at the bottom of Snapchat settings.
“Button Size”: Change the pixel size of all iota buttons.
“Hide Title”: Hide iota’s title and subtitle from main pages.
“Hide Subtitle”: Hide subtitle text under the iota header title.
“Randomize Subtitle”: Randomize the subtitle text.
“Custom Title”: Enter any text you want as the iota header title text.
“RGB Animation”: Make some iota aspects go gamer mode.
“Pull To Refresh”: Customize the pull to refresh ghost.
“Ghost Theme”: Choose a custom ghost theme.
 

SPOOF:

“”By Search” Spoof”: Spoof “By Search” text when adding people.
“Spoof Location”: Toggle whether you’d like to spoof your location.
“Pick Location”: Pick the new spoofed location.
“Teleport to Friends”: Tap a friend on the SnapMap to teleport to them.
“Spoof Story Views”: Spoof the number of story views.
“Spoof Story Screenshots”: Spoof the number of story screenshots.
 

INTERFACE:

“Load Banner”: Show a banner when iota is fully loaded.
“Show Banners”: Show native Snapchat banners when doing certain actions.
“Lock Buttons”: Lock the position of the buttons and disable movement.
“No Map Swipe”: Disable swiping to SnapMap.
“Open Link Default”: Open links in Safari.
“Hide New Chat Button”: Hide the blue button on the bottom of recent UI versions.
“Hide Discover”: Remove the Discover Stories section.
“Chat Swipe”: Swipe on any part of the chat to open it.
“Loop Media”: Content will loop rather than skip to the next.
 

Features are always subject to change depending on Snapchat updates.
apps.versionDescription:
• Updated Snapchat to v12.40.0
• Updated iota to v4.0.0

versions.localizedDescription:
• Updated Snapchat to v12.40.0
• Updated iota to v4.0.0

apps.name: Snapchat Wicked
apps.subtitle: A Cracked Snapchat Tweak with many features!
apps.localizedDescription:
Snapchat Wicked (Cracked)

Activate Crack by entering any 15-character email and license when prompted

Note: Notifications may not work.

FEATURES:


SAVE/UPLOAD/SEEN FEATURES

Suppress Save to Camera Roll → Suppress notification for saving media in camera roll from chat. Allows for batch saving. (Works only inside chat) Upload Button → Show an overlay button to upload media (Requires restart). Image Editor → Built in image editor when uploading images. Save Button → Show an overlay button to save media. Save Snaps in Folder → Save snaps in a folder organized by usernames instead of gallery. Open Folder → Open saved snaps folder Seen Button For Snaps → Show an overlay button to mark snaps as seen. Seen Button For Stories → Show an overlay button to mark stories as seen. Skip on Seen → Skip to the next snap when marked as seen. Alternatively, pressing the button again will mark as unseen. Stories Auto-Seen → Automatically mark all non-friends stories as seen. ▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬

AUDIO FEATURES

Upload Voice Note → Tap voice note button to upload voice notes. Save Voice Messages → Hold audio message to save in files ▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬

CHAT FEATURES

Auto Save Chat → Automatically save all chats/media. Auto Save Snaps → Automatically save all snaps in chat. (Requires Auto Save Chat to be enabled) Chat Ghost → Open chat without marking messages as seen. Bitmoji presence is also disabled when this option is on Ignore Deleted Chats → Stop chats from being deleted Deleted Chat Color → Color for deleted chats Suppress Typing Notification → Suppress typing notification when typing in chat. No Bitmoji Presence → Do not show bitmoji presence in chat. Chat Swipe → Swipe on any part of the chat to open it. ▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬

RECORDING/SCREENSHOTS FEATURES

Screenshot Confirm → Show a confirmation dialog for sending screenshots notification. Screen Record Supression → Suppress screen recording notifications. Screenshot Supression → Suppress screenshot notifications. Screenshot Button → Show an overlay button to send screenshot notification. ▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬

SPOOF FEATURES

Spoof Added By Search → When adding people in search, it will instead show up as Added by Quick Add. Spoof Location → Use the location selector below to change location. Pick Location → Choose the location from the map (Requires enabling Spoof Location). Teleport to Friends → Tap a friend on the SnapMap to teleport to them. Spoof Story Views → Enter a number to spoof story views (Leave blank to disable). Spoof Story Screenshots → Enter a number to spoof story screenshots (Leave blank to disable). ▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬

WICKED INTERFACE FEATURES

Disable Icons → Disable custom account/settings icon to hide presence of wicked (Requires restart). Button Size → Size of all buttons Lock Buttons → Lock the position of the buttons and disable movement. Reset Button Layout → Restore button positions to default configuration. ▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬

SNAPCHAT INTERFACE FEATURES

Change Icon → Change app icon. Hide New Chat Button → Hide the blue button on the bottom on recent UI versions. No Map Swipe → Disable swiping to SnapMap. Open Link Default → Open links in chat using safari. Hide Call Buttons → Hide the call buttons in chat. Hide Discover → Removes the Discover stories section. Hide Quick Add → Removes the Quick Add section from the chat page. Loop Media → Content will loop rather than skip to the next. ▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬

MISC FEATURES

Call Confirm → Show a confirmation dialog before making calls. Show Banners → Enable banners notifications for some interactions (saving, marking as seen). Keep Sent Snaps → Sent snaps will be shown only in your side of the chat, so you may know what snaps you've sent. ▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬

EXPERIMENTS (NO SUPPORT) FEATURES

Spam Screenshots → Spam 100 screenshots in chat (camera button in input bar to toggle) No Bitmojis → Do not render bitmojis Disable Ads → Block all Snapchat advertisements. Randomize Best Friends → Randomly change the order of the best friends list. Hide Friendmoji → Hide the friendmojis in chat page (Not Bitmoji. Requires pull to refresh). Spoof Badge → Enter a number to spoof the application badge number. Exit app to see changes, if you have snapchat in background, it will not work, you need to exit the app each time you want to spoof the badge count. (Leave blank to disable).

apps.name: Instagram++
apps.subtitle: A must-have tweak for Instagram users!
apps.localizedDescription:
This App comes with 2 Tweaks: Plus (Cracked) and Rocket (Cracked)

Rocket enriches Instagram client with loads of features! Starting from saving posts, reposting, checking if other users follow you and many more.

Feed Enhancements
• Download posts (Videos and Photos)
• Repost posts (Videos and Photos)
• Long press on posts to zoom
• Copy text captions from posts

Stories
• Save stories to Camera Roll
• View stories anonymously
• Manually mark stories as seen
• Mute and unmute video stories
• Upload from Camera Roll (Swipe up)
• Disable auto switch between stories
• Hide stories bar from feed

Profile
• Show if other users follow you
• Long press on profile image to zoom
• Show exact value of numerical stats

Direct Messages
• Disable read receipts
• Save messaged stories to Camera Roll
• Disable screenshot detection in stories

Spoofing (Local Only)
• Verify your profile
• Followers count
• Following count
• Uploads count


Plus for Instagram is a lightweight, and all-in-one tweak crafted to enhance and unlock Instagram's full potential for users. You can do many things that you can't do before on Instagram with this tweak, including ability to stalk person that you love without them knowing!

Features Include:

• See Unsent Direct Message
• Comment Translation
• Focus Mode
• Clean Experience
• Media Downloader
• Watch Story or Live without them knowing!
• Story Video Editor
• Copy Comment Text
• Various Confirmation
• Low Data Mode
• Show Total Likes & Views
• Add Unlimited Accounts
• Full-Resolution Profile Picture
• Disable Quick Reactions
• Unlimited Media Replay (Direct Message)
• Disable Typing... Status (Direct Message)
• Disable Message Marked as Seen (Direct Message)

And More!

apps.name: MyFitnessPal++

apps.localizedDescription:
• Premium Features Enabled

Track progress toward your nutrition, water, fitness, and weight loss goals with MyFitnessPal. This all-in-one food tracker and health app is like having a nutrition coach, meal planner, and food diary with you at all times.

MyFitnessPal isn't another restrictive diet app. This is a health app to help you learn about your habits u2026 see how you eat u2026 make smarter food choices u2026 find motivation & support ... and conquer your health goals.

apps.name: Deezer++
apps.subtitle: Deezer with premium activated!
apps.localizedDescription:
Deezer is a music streaming platform that enables you to match The Power of Music to your lifestyle and identity.

Enjoy a massive music catalog that has everything and more with in-built algorithms that learn what you like and recommend more of it. The Deezer music player is your companion across all devices, providing access to the artists, songs and communities that speak to you. Discover and create playlists in your favorite genres: hip hop, rap, rock, lofi. No WiFi needed — download songs and enjoy offline music — perfect for when at home or on the go.

This is the most personalized and intuitive listening experience, brought to you from the home of music.

With Deezer Free*, you'll get all you need in one app:

• Flow, our feature for infinite, personalized mixes (on-point recommendations every time)
• SongCatcher, for identifying any song playing around you (try singing or humming for magic results)
• Game on with music quiz (see how fast you can guess your favorite song)
• A ludicrously-large catalog (go on, try to find a song that isn't there)
• The freedom to play music based on moods, niche genres and scenes
• Personal and collaborative playlists, favorites, radio* and more
• Dive deeper into the music with the Lyrics feature and translated lyrics
• Sleep timer function (for those beauty Zzzzzz)
• Sharing function for spreading the love on socials


Looking for a level up? Switch to Deezer Premium**, Deezer Family** or Deezer Student** and you'll benefit from these added perks:

• No ads, ever!
• Offline listening (just cause the signal cuts doesn't mean the music has to)
• Unlimited skips, unlimited listening
• HiFi sound (High Fidelity, lossless quality at 1,411 kbps)
• FLAC-standard quality on millions of tracks
• High-end sound system compatibility

Compatible devices:
Get Deezer on all your connected devices — Google Nest, HomePod Mini, Amazon Alexa, Sonos and more.

apps.name: SoundCloud++
apps.subtitle: SoundCloud with no ads!
apps.localizedDescription:
Enhance your SoundCloud experience with the following features:

• Remove Ads
• Remove Promoted Playlists
• Remove Upsell Buttons


HOW TO INSTALL IF NOT WORKING

(iOS 15):

1. Download the REGULAR SoundCloud app from the app store (IMPORTANT)
2. Sign in to the app
3. Delete the app while still signed in
4. Download the IPA (app file) from the table below.
5. Install using your preferred sideloading method** (AltStore, Sideloadly, appdb, etc.)
6. Once installed, you can enjoy, as you should be logged in already.


(iOS 16):

1. Until fixed, users will have to link a Google or Facebook account to their SoundCloud. This can be done on the SoundCloud website.
2. Download the IPA (app file) from the table below.
3. Install using your preferred sideloading method** (AltStore, Sideloadly, appdb, etc.)
4. Sign in using your Google or Facebook account
5. Use the same method uYou used for bypassing the unsafe installation login error


(iOS 16) [Method 2]:

1. Until fixed, users will have to link a Google or Facebook account to their SoundCloud. This can be done on the SoundCloud website.
2. Download the REGULAR SoundCloud app from the AppStore
3. Sign in to the app using Google or Facebook Account sign-in
4. Delete the app while still signed in
5. Download the IPA (app file) from the table below.
6. Install using your preferred sideloading method** (AltStore, Sideloadly, appdb, etc.)
7. Once installed, you can enjoy, as you should be logged in already.

apps.name: Spotify++
apps.subtitle: Spotify with free premium, and extra UI features
apps.localizedDescription:
Spotify++ contants a tweak that activates Premium. As well as a number of tweaks to customise the UI and improve the overall user experience.

Here are the following tweaks:

• Spotilife - Premium for free.

• Sposify - A Tweak to customize your Spotify App UI and expand functionalities.

• Volify - Adds a volume slider to Spotify.

• SpotifyAllowSetting - Allows you to access all of the settings in Spotify that are normally disabled when someone else is playing music from another device.

• SpotifyNoPodcasts - Hides Podcasts from from Home and Library

• SpotifyHighQuality - Enables 'Very High' Quality in Audio Quality settings

•TrueShuffle - Enables true random shuffling (Spotify prioritizes Songs you have listened to more often by default)

• Spoticentre - Centres the song/artist in now playing (Only working on some devices)



NOTE

The ‘Car’ setting has been replaced with the sposify tweak settings so unfortunatley you cannot change car settings - all good tho, nobody use that shi anyways, and when car view enables when u in the car, just click ‘turn off car view’ at the top right corner.


All tweaks are injected by myself, WuXu, and ensured to be working perfectly ;)
apps.versionDescription: • Added SpotilifeFix - May fix the issue where premium is not activated after downloading on certain devices and IOS versions

versions.localizedDescription: • Added SpotilifeFix - May fix the issue where premium is not activated after downloading on certain devices and IOS versions

• Added SpotifyNoPodcasts
• Added SpotifyHighQuality
• Added Spoticentre
• Added TrueShuffle

apps.name: YouTube (w/ uYou+)
apps.subtitle: The All-In-One Tweak for YouTube.
apps.localizedDescription:
From the dev:

• YouTube really messed up with OLED dark mode in v18.15.1+. We should stay on the lower version for now.
• For those who're using the pre-release version (v18.15.1-3.0): I strongly recommend you downgrade from v18.15.1-3.0 to v18.14.1-3.0 (this version).
• Guess my journey with uYouPlus will end here. The app will be updated by other developers. This is probably the last time I - qnblackcat, update uYouPlus. Enjoy!


If you're a YouTube app user then you'll have to take advantage of uYou tweak.

With uYou, you can enjoy video and audio downloads with importing features, play videos in PiP (Picture In Picture), background audio playback, and a whole lot of other features that are usually restricted/not available in the YouTube app.

uYou will add an icon button on the top right corner (beside the search icon) to show the Downloads/Downloading list.
You can also access uYou's settings from the Downloads list.

Features:

• Remove YouTube Ads.
• Background playback for YT videos.
• Download Videos/Audio/Shorts for offline playback (supports up to 4K).
• Support all YT Formats (MP4 + WebM), all qualities (from 144p to 4K) and all frames (30fps, 50fps, and 60fps).
• Play saved media in a custom player with background playback support.
• Supports mini-player for easier navigation.
• Supports scrubbing/controls from Control Center.
• Share/Export saved videos to Camera Roll or to any other app.
• Gestures Controls on Video (Swipe Left/Right to increase/decrease Volume/Brightness/Seek).
• Playback Speed Controls.
• Play videos in PiP (Picture In Picture).
• iPad layout style.
• Sideloaded iPA.
• In-app Settings.
• Support Cercube and DLEasy migration to move all of your downloads into uYou with a tap of a button.
• More options are in the settings.
apps.versionDescription:
• YouTube updated to v18.14.1
• uYou updated to v3.0

uYouPlus:

• Removed some tweaks/patches as they have been implemented in uYou 3.0 (YTAutoFullScreen, YTShortsProgressBar, hide Shorts buttons, keychain patching, etc...)
• Added YTStockVolumeHUD: replaces YouTube's volume HUD with the stock volume HUD (Video Player Options).
• Added an option to disable Double tap to seek (Video Player Options).
• Fixed Red Progress bar not working by @dayanch96
